items.desc: FIFA games feature realistic graphics, licensed teams, players, and stadiums from leagues around the world, providing an immersive football experience. The gameplay mechanics aim to replicate the excitement and strategic elements of real-world football matches.

Each year's edition of FIFA introduces improvements to gameplay mechanics, graphics, and game modes, based on player feedback and advancements in technology. FIFA games are available on various platforms, including PlayStation, Xbox, Nintendo Switch, and PC.
